page.title: 15FURTHER LOCAL NEWS ITEMS
page.content:
Furness County Fair (1985)
This very popular event, which is organised by the Dalton and District Round Table took place on 15th June for the first time in Askam. This very attractive fair includes such competitions as gun dog tests, working tests and other canine challenges such as lurcher shows, hound trails and the British Fell Race Championship. The other activities include terrier racing, clay pigeon shoot, tug of war, children's sports, the greasy pole,ice cream and other amusements which include the inevitable beer tent. All profits from this event are ploughed back into the community by the Round Table.
